snippet: Some legal experts point to a 2001 Supreme Court case in which justices ruled in favor of a radio station that broadcast a surreptitious recording....
abstract: News Analysis; number of First Amendment experts say Donald Trump would have trouble winning lawsuit against The New York Times for publishing parts of his tax returns; Supreme Court ruling in 2001 held that any effort to punish publication of truthful information of public concern, even if information was provided by someone acting illegally, undermines central tenets of First Amendment.
lead_paragraph: Some legal experts point to a 2001 Supreme Court case in which justices ruled in favor of a radio station that broadcast a surreptitious recording.

headline.main: Donald Trump Would Have Trouble Winning a Suit Over The Times’s Tax Article
headline.print_headline: Trump Would Have Trouble Winning a Suit Over a Tax Article, Experts Say
